ThingDef.label: crashed scavenger ship
ThingDef.description: A crashed scavenger ship that was abandoned not too long ago. Luckily enough, all its cargo were also abandoned, so you can destroy the ship and claim all the cargo for yourself.

li.letterText: Passing near the intact remains of a crashed scavenger ship, {PAWN_nameDef} noticed some intact strongboxes and other goodies.\n\nBy destroying the ship, {PAWN_nameDef} will be able to recieve all the stuff that are inside the ship.

li.inspectString: Contains a bunch of useful stuff that would benifit anyone.

ThingDef.label: ruined ship part
ThingDef.description: A damaged remains of a scavenger ship which is now beyond repair. Can be deconstructed for resources.

ThingDef.label: ultra-compact container box
ThingDef.description: A computer access container box that contains a healthy supply of emergency supplies.

ThingDef.label: damaged ship pod
ThingDef.description: A damaged exotic resource pod from a capital class cargo freighter. It contains exotic resources if deconstructed.

ThingDef.label: damaged ship chunk
ThingDef.description: Some damaged remains of a gigantic cargo freighter. Can be deconstructed for resources.

ThingDef.label: auto pulse blaster
ThingDef.description: A self-powered turret mounted with a pulse blaster. It cannot sense targets at very long ranges.

ThingDef.label: pulse blaster
ThingDef.description: A rapid-fire pulse blaster for area fire.

ThingDef.label: overdriven mech assembler ship
ThingDef.description: A mechanoid ship that was modified into an automated mechanoid factory, which was set to overdrive where it is capable of fabricating mechanoid variants of the alpha class at a rapid pace.

ThingDef.label: overdriven mech assembler ship
ThingDef.description: A mechanoid ship that was modified into an automated mechanoid factory, which was set to overdrive where it is capable of fabricating mechanoid variants of the beta class at a rapid pace.

ThingDef.label: overdriven mech assembler ship
ThingDef.description: A mechanoid ship that was modified into an automated mechanoid factory, which was set to overdrive where it is capable of fabricating mechanoid variants of the gamma class at a rapid pace.

ThingDef.label: overdriven mech assembler ship
ThingDef.description: A mechanoid ship that was modified into an automated mechanoid factory, which was set to overdrive where it is capable of fabricating mechanoid variants of the ultima class at a rapid pace.

ThingDef.label: psychic droner ship
ThingDef.description: A psychic droner that was redesigned into a ship. This devious archotech device can transmit an even deadlier psychic drone that has a high chance of causing berserk onto humanoids every three days. Drawing near to it would be very detrimental, since the psychic frequency would raise dramatically to the point of drawing the victim to insanity. The ship is highly durable and protected with a high frequency shield generator.

GameConditionDef.label: Severe psychic drone
GameConditionDef.description: A severe psychic droner field is affecting {0}s and reducing their consciousness and increasing their tendencies to go berserk. The effect is modulated by an individual's psychic sensitivity.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: a psychic droner wave will reduce the consciousness and increase berserk tendencies of all [psychicSuppressorGender]s around [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration]
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The severe psychic droner field has dissipated.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A severe psychic droner field has begun reducing the consciousness, and forcing them to go berserk after three days of {0}s across the whole region. The effect is modulated by an individual's psychic sensitivity.

HediffDef.label: severe psychic drone
HediffDef.description: The effect of a severe psychic droner field. Coordination, reasoning, and morality are muddled.

li.label: Severe psychic drone
li.description: This damn psychic drone is killing me!!

ThingDef.label: EMI dynamo ship
ThingDef.description: An EMI dynamo that was redesigned into a ship. As the name suggests, the ship has the ability to disable electrical devices with an added bonus of polluting the entire region with radiation. The ship is protected with a high frequency shield generator.

GameConditionDef.label: EMI radiation
GameConditionDef.description: An electromagnetic interference dynamo is projecting an EM interference field, disabling electrical devices and cause radiation poisoning.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: a distant EMI dynamo ship will blast [map_definite] with an EMI field with radiation, shutting down electrical devices and cause radiation poisoning for [gameConditionDuration_duration]
GameConditionDef.letterText: An EMI field has been generated. It is disabling electrical devices and cause radiation poisoning.

ThingDef.label: toxic spewer ship
ThingDef.description: A toxic spewer that was redesigned into a ship. The ship can spread noxious chemicals through the atmosphere, which results in toxic rain that can turn the entire region into a toxic hellscape. The ship can fabricate mechanoid pestilence to besiege your colony, and it is protected with a high frequency shield generator.

GameConditionDef.label: Toxic rain
GameConditionDef.description: A modified toxic spewer is polluting the atmosphere, causing toxic rain to the entire region.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: a distant toxic spewer ship will rain down [map_definite] with toxic rain, inflicting deadly neurotoxins for [gameConditionDuration_duration]
GameConditionDef.letterText: A toxic rain has been conjured. It is blanketing the entire region with nerotoxins.

ThingDef.label: advanced cold snap ship
ThingDef.description: A ship that can conjure an extreme cold snap, that can blanket the entire region with snow through heavy snowfall, and can reduce the temperature to -500 degrees. The ship can also add a bonus of inflicting the victim with heat nullifying nanites that nullify the victim's resistance to cold. The ship is protected with a high frequency shield generator.

GameConditionDef.label: Extreme cold snap
GameConditionDef.description: A modified ship is plunging the entire region in absolute cold, all while infecting organic beings with heat nullifying nanites.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: a distant cold snap ship will affect [map_definite] with reduced temperature, and inflicting heat nullifying nanites for [gameConditionDuration_duration]
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The extreme cold snap has disappeared.
GameConditionDef.letterText: The extreme cold snap have arrived. It is plunging the entire region with absolute cold.

ThingDef.label: advanced heat wave ship
ThingDef.description: A ship that can conjure an extreme heat wave, that can subject the entire region to extreme heat. The ship can also add a bonus of inflicting the victim with cold nullifying nanites that nullify the victim's resistance to heat. The ship is protected with a high frequency shield generator.

GameConditionDef.label: Extreme heat wave
GameConditionDef.description: A modified ship is plunging the entire region in extreme heat, all while infecting organic beings with cold nullifying nanites.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: a distant heat wave ship will affect [map_definite] with increased temperature, and inflicting cold nullifying nanites for [gameConditionDuration_duration]
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The extreme heat wave has disappeared.
GameConditionDef.letterText: The extreme heat wave have arrived. It is plunging the entire region with extreme heat.

ThingDef.label: crimson ship
ThingDef.description: One of the most dangerous mechanoid ship ever recorded, capable of conjuring the dreaded crimson rain that can infect humanlike victims with the rage virus. The ship is protected with a high frequency shield generator, along with a cadre of hostile mech variants.
